original_title: シリーズ憲法 〜第9条・戦争放棄「忘却」〜
overview: Part of the documentary project that each company competed on the theme of the Constitution of Japan.With the keyword "oblivion," Koreeda explores how "Article 9 of the Constitution renounces war" has been involved in people's inner world, turning the camera around in various places, including his father's hometown, Taiwan.It is a unique work that reflects the personal history deeply.
title: Series Constitution. Article 9: War Renunciation "Oblivion"
